Brands We Use

For full transparency, here is a running list of the specific products mentioned in our content. We only recommend what we actually use.

Supplement

NOW Foods Whole Psyllium Husks

The MVP of soluble fiber. We use "Whole Husks" rather than fine powder for better texture in bowls. Essential for binding bile acids.

Used in: The HeartHealth Oat Bowl
View Product
Supplement

Isopure Protein Powder (Unflavored)

A clean, zero-carb protein powder. It dissolves completely and doesn't alter the taste of your berries or greens.

Used in: Smoothies & Oat Bowls
View Product
Pantry

Trader Joe's Ancient Grain Oats

Contains Amaranth, Quinoa, and Flax. This blend offers better texture and higher protein content than standard rolled oats.

Used in: The HeartHealth Oat Bowl
In Store Only
Pantry

Trader Joe's Creamy Almond Butter

A great source of monounsaturated fats. The "No Salt" version has only one ingredient: almonds. No palm oil or added sugar.

Used in: Smoothies & Oat Bowls
View Product
Fridge

Trader Joe's Greek Nonfat Yogurt

A high-protein, zero-fat yogurt that adds creaminess and satiety. We prefer the Plain version to avoid added sugars found in vanilla flavors.

Used in: Smoothies & Oat Bowls
View Product
Pantry

Trader Joe's Chia Seeds

High in Omega-3 fatty acids and fiber. They help thicken the oat bowl and provide a satisfying crunch.

Used in: The HeartHealth Oat Bowl
In Store Only
